language.entry: The nomad now offers better pricing on trinkets. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Level: {?level}%d{colour_end}
More merchants now come to town, increasing the selection of available trinkets. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Level: {?level}%d{colour_end}
{colour_start|attacktype}Appraisal has been improved{colour_end}

{colour_start|common}Common{colour_end} - 53% {colour_start|uncommon}Uncommon{colour_end} - 19% {colour_start|rare}Rare{colour_end} - 14% {colour_start|very_rare}Very Rare{colour_end} - 7% {colour_start|ancestral}Ancestral{colour_end} - 3% {colour_start|harmful}Crimson Court{colour_end} - 3% {colour_start|trophy}Special{colour_end} - 1%
La Nomade offre désormais des prix plus avantageux pour ses breloques. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Niveau : {?level}%d{colour_end}
Plus de marchands viennent désormais en ville, augmentant le choix des breloques disponibles. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Niveau : {?level}%d{colour_end}
{colour_start|attacktype}Appraisal has been improved{colour_end}

Die Nomadin bietet Accessoires jetzt zu einem günstigeren Preis an. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Stufe: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Mehr Händler besuchen jetzt das Dorf und bieten eine größere Auswahl an Accessoires. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Stufe: {?level}%d{colour_end}
{colour_start|attacktype}Appraisal has been improved{colour_end}

游牧商人现在可以以更优惠的价格进行买卖。 {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}等级：{?level}%d{colour_end}
更多的游牧商人来到了小镇，增加了可选饰品的数量。 {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}等级：{?level}%d{colour_end}
{colour_start|attacktype}游牧商人的鉴定能力已经得到提升{colour_end}

유목민이 이제 장신구를 싸게 판매합니다. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}레벨: {?level}%d{colour_end}
더 많은 상인들이 마을에 들어와 장신구의 종류가 늘어났습니다. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}레벨: {?level}%d{colour_end}
{colour_start|attacktype}Appraisal has been improved{colour_end}

더 많은 상인들이 마을을 방문하여, 더 다양한 장신구를 구매할 수 있게 되었습니다. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}레벨: {?level}%d{colour_end}
